thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-‍Think3 Says Launches $1 Billion Private Equity Fund

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-‍Think3 Says Launches $1 Billion Private Equity Fund
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Think3:‍
* THINK3 SAYS LAUNCHES $1 BILLION PRIVATE EQUITY FUND FOR SAAS FOUNDERS TO EXIT CURRENT COMPANY AND BEGIN NEXT STARTUP​
* ‍THINK3 SAYS IS PART OF THE ESW CAPITAL FAMILY​ * ‍THINK3 SAYS FUND WILL BUY SAAS FOUNDERS COMPANY AND TRANSITION FOUNDERS IN 100 DAYS TO TAKE THEIR FULL TEAM, BUILD THEIR NEXT STARTUP​
* ‍THINK3 SAYS FUND WILL ALSO PROVIDE EXITING SAAS FOUNDERS​, $500,000 IN A NO-EQUITY ANGEL ROUND TO GET STARTED Source text for Eikon:
